item.title: A skeleton to display and web-format data got from web service (in JSON)
Simple IaaS API documentation with swagger
item.description: In a previous post I have explained how to develop a very simple API server. Without the associated documentation, the API will be useless. Let’s see how we can use swagger-ui in this project to generate a beautiful documentation. Note I’m blogging and experimenting, of course, in the “real” life, it’s a lot better to code the API interface before implementing the middleware. About Swagger Swagger is a framework. On top of the swagger project is composed of several tools.
